channel.title: Server Problem
channel.description:
Please, help would be strongly appreciated :o
Anyways, I recently added working anti-trade dupe. Yet, at points the server still nulls, example, when I look at the run.bat it is being spammed with
[code]null null null null null null [/code]
And is repeated. This is most likely caused by people attempting to dupe, but when the server is being "nulled" everything is repeated. Example, if I say "hi" on the server it will be spammed continuously. If someone teleports, the emote will be spammed continuously. Please, I need help, i'm losing players and I don't know what to do, once again I will appreciate any help :D

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

That’s exactly what you want. Sometimes -Xlint shows you errors that the compiler ignores.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

@echo off
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_17/bin/javac.exe” -Xlint *.java
pause

Change what’s in red to your own jdk version.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:3, topic:322093”]Try putting -Xlint deprecation in your compiler.

@echo off
javac -Xlint *.java
pause[/quote]

I run the compiler, get this

'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:

There is only one solution... Catch the server on fire.

Was that even a answer to his problem?
